div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 339 Athens (Dipylon), 1875 (95) Burial: c. 86 B.C. (T, Lewis) Contents: 58 AR. From excavations Athens: 32 New Style tetradr. Mithradates VI: 4 tetradr. Disposition: Athens Thompson, Athens, pp. 507-9 (citing earlier publications) Lewis, NC 1962, p. 282
